section.p: Docfacto has a runtime engine component, as well as Sonar and Eclipse plugin components, which takes the form of a plugins. The runtime engine installation has the Docfacto.xml configuration file, which the Sonar and Eclipse installations requires to be complete. When upgrading, you must take care to swap to the new Docfacto.xml. Often during releases the schema of the Docfacto.xml will change to contain extra functionality. You must look at the old Docfacto.xml and merge in your changes with the new Docfacto.xml
